Posts.Content: rasquel wrote: i had to have 25 rad treatments and 8 boosters for dcis. which ive been done about a month now. but now im have alot on lung imflamation. ive been being treated for this for about a month now. nothing seems to help. ive went back to the radiation dr. and ask if this is related to the treatments. she said that they only treated breast tissue. and that my lungs were not being exposed to treatments. has anyone here dealt with this. thank you for any imput. Posts.Title: lung issues after rads. rasquel Leah_S
